analyzed: catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ hetu pratyayaḥ samanantara pratyayaḥ ālambana pratyayaḥ adhipati pratyayaḥ ca

original: tatra yo janako hetuḥ saḥ hetupratyayaḥ |
analyzed: tatra yaḥ janakaḥ hetuḥ saḥ hetu pratyayaḥ
yaḥ punar upāya hetuḥ saḥ ūdhipati pratyayaḥ veditavyaḥ
samanantara pratyayaḥ ca ālambana pratyayaḥ ca citta caitasikānām eva dharmāṇām

original: tathā hi cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prāgutpannāvakāśadānaparigṛhītā ālambanaparigṛhītāśca prādurbhavanti pravartante ca |
analyzed: tathā hi citta caitasikāḥ dharmāḥ prāc utpanna avakāśa dāna parigṛhītāḥ ālambana parigṛhītāḥ ca prādurbhavanti pravartante ca
tasmāt samanantara pratyayaḥ ālambana pratyayaḥ ca parigraha hetunā saṃgṛhītau veditavyau
tatra katham ebhiḥ daśabhiḥ hetubhiḥ sarva laukikāḥ bhāvāḥ pravartante
kathañca saṃkleśaḥ bhavati
kathañca vyavadānam

original: yānīmāni vividhāni sasyāni dhānyasaṃkhyātāni loke yairayaṃ loko jīvikāṃ kalpayati teṣāṃ tāvadyadidaṃ nāma saṃjñā vyāgvyāhāro vividhastad yathā yavaśāligodhūmatilamudgamāṣakulatthādikaḥ |
analyzed: yāni imāni vividhāni sasyāni dhānya saṃkhyātāni loke yaiḥ ayam lokaḥ jīvikām kalpayati teṣām tāvat yat idam nāma saṃjñā vyāc vyāhāraḥ vividhaḥ tat yathā yava śāli godhūma tila mudga māṣa kulattha ādikaḥ

original: ayameṣāmanuvyavahārahetuḥ yavā ānīyantāṃ dīyantāṃ piṣyantāṃ sthāpyantāmityevamādikasya vyavahārasya yathā yavā evamavaśiṣṭheṣvapi veditavyam jighatsāpipāsādaurbalyaṃ kāyasthityapekṣaṃ kavaḍīkārāhārāsvādāpekṣañca |
analyzed: ayam eṣām anuvyavahāra hetuḥ yavāḥ ānīyantām dīyantām piṣyantām sthāpyantām iti evam ādikasya vyavahārasya yathā yavāḥ evam avaśiṣṭheṣu api veditavyam jighatsā pipāsā daurbalyam kāya sthiti apekṣam kavaḍīkāra āhāra āsvāda apekṣam ca
teṣu arthi tvam paryeṣaṇā upanādānam upabhogaḥ ca bhavati
ayam eṣām apekṣā hetuḥ

original: yato yataḥ svabījād yasya [yasya] sasyasya prādurbhāvo bhavati tadbījaṃ tasyākṣepahetuḥ |
analyzed: yatas yatas sva bījāt yasya yasya sasyasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati tat bījam tasya ākṣepa hetuḥ
pṛthivī vṛṣṭi ādikaḥ pratyaya uḍkura prādurbhāvāya parigraha hetuḥ tat bījam tasya aṅkurasya abhinirvṛtti hetuḥ
sa khalu aṅkura kāṇḍa patra paraṃparā santānaḥ tasyāḥ sasya niṣpatteḥ sasya paripāka gyā āvāhaka hetuḥ

original: yavabījācca yavāṅkurasya yavasasyasya ca prādurbhāvo bhavati nānyasya |
analyzed: yava bījāt ca yava aṅkurasya yava sasyasya ca prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati na anyasya
evam pariśiṣṭebhyaḥ veditavyam
ayam eṣām pratiniyama hetuḥ

original: sarve caite apekṣāhetumupādāya pratiniyamahetvantāheta vaḥ sasyasyābhiniṣpattaye sahakārihetuḥ |
analyzed: sarve ca ete apekṣā hetum upādāya vaḥ sasyasya abhiniṣpattaye sahakāri hetuḥ
na hi tat dhānyam anyatama hetu vaikalyāt niṣpadyate
tasmāt sarvā sā sāmagrī sahakāri hetuḥ iti ucyate
aśani sasya roga nipāta ādayaḥ ntarāyāḥ virodha hetuḥ
tad vaikalyam na anantarāyaḥ avirodha hetuḥ

original: evamete daśa hetavastadanyeṣvapi laukikeṣu bhāveṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ |
analyzed: evam ete daśa hetavaḥ tad anyeṣu api laukikeṣu bhāveṣu yathāyogam veditavyāḥ
tat yathā dhānya parigrahe

original: tatra sarvasya pratītyasamutpādasya yadidaṃ nāmasaṃjñā-vāgvyāhāraḥ tadyathā avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃvistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ
analyzed: tatra sarvasya pratītyasamutpādasya yat idam nāma saṃjñā vāc vyāhāraḥ tat yathā avidyā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam nāma rūpam vistareṇa yāvat jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsāḥ
iti ayantā vat saṃkleśasya anuvyavahāra hetuḥ

original: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityevamādikasya anuvyavahārasya viṣayāsvādāpekṣā caiṣu bhavāṅgeṣu pravṛtiḥ |
analyzed: avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvat jāti pratyayam jarā maraṇam iti evamādikasya anuvyavahārasya viṣaya āsvāda apekṣā ca eṣu bhava aṅgeṣu pravṛtiḥ
ayam asya saṃkleśasya apekṣā hetuḥ

original: avidyādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe dharme yāni bījāni jātasya bhūtasyeha tānyanyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyākṣepahetuḥ |
analyzed: avidyā ādīnām dharmāṇām dṛṣṭe dharme yāni bījāni jātasya bhūtasya iha tāni anya jānmikasya jāti jarā maraṇasya ākṣepa hetuḥ
asat puruṣa saṃsevā asat dharma śravaṇam ayoniśa manaskāraḥ pūrva abhyāsa āvedhaḥ ca avidyā ādīnām utpattaye parigraha hetuḥ
svaka svakam bījam avidyā ādīnām nirvṛṃtti hetuḥ

original: te punaravidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā uttarottarāvāhanapāraṃparyeṇa tasyānyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyāvāhakahetuḥ |
analyzed: te punar avidyā ādayaḥ bhava paryavasānāḥ uttarottara āvāhana pāraṃparyeṇa tasya anya jānmikasya jāti jarā maraṇasya āvāhaka hetuḥ

original: anye saha svavīryairavidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā narakopapattaye saṃvartante |
analyzed: anye saha sva vīryaiḥ avidyā ādayaḥ bhava paryavasānāḥ naraka upapattaye saṃvartante
anye tiryak preta manuṣya deva upapattaye
ityā iyam saṃkleśasya pratiniyama hetuḥ

original: apekṣāhetumādiṃ kṛtvā sarva ete hetavaḥ pratiniyamahetuparyavasānāḥ sahakāriheturityucyate |
analyzed: apekṣā hetum ādim kṛtvā sarve ete hetavaḥ pratiniyama hetu paryavasānāḥ sahakāri hetuḥ iti ucyate

original: tasya punaḥ saṃkleśasya virodhahetuḥ gotrasaṃpad buddhānāmutpādaḥ saddharmasya deśanā satpuruṣasaṃsevā saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāro dharmānudharmapratipattiḥ sarve ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ |
analyzed: tasya punar saṃkleśasya virodha hetuḥ gotra saṃpad buddhānām utpādaḥ saddharmasya deśanā sat puruṣa saṃsevā saddharma śravaṇam yoniśas manaskāraḥ dharma anudharma pratipattiḥ sarve ca bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ
avirodha hetuḥ eṣām eva yathā uddiṣṭānām dharmāṇām vaikalyam virahita tvam
evam ebhiḥ daśabhiḥ hetubhiḥ sarvaḥ saṃkleśaḥ sarva sattvānām veditavyaḥ

original: tatra yaḥ sarveṣu vyavadānapakṣyeṣu dharmeṃṣu nirodhe ca nirvāṇe nāmasaṃjñāvāgvyāhāraḥ |
analyzed: tatra yaḥ sarveṣu vyavadāna pakṣyeṣu dharmeṃṣu nirodhe ca nirvāṇe nāma saṃjñā vāc vyāhāraḥ
ayam vyavadānasya anuvyavahāra hetuḥ

original: itīmāni smṛtyupasthānāni samyak prahāṇāni yāvadāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaṃḥ |
analyzed: iti imāni smṛti upasthānāni samyak prahāṇāni yāvat ārya aṣṭāṅgaḥ mārgaḥ
avidyā nirodhāt ca saṃskāra nirodhaḥ vistareṇa yāvat jāti nirodhāt jarā maraṇa nirodhaḥ iti asya evaṃbhāgīyasya anuvyavahārasya

original: tatra yā saṃskārādīnavāpekṣā vyavadānaparyeṣaṇā vyavadānaparigraho vyavadānapariniṣpattiḥ ayamasyāpekṣāhetuḥ |
analyzed: tatra yā saṃskāra ādīnava apekṣā vyavadāna paryeṣaṇā vyavadāna parigrahaḥ vyavadāna pariniṣpattiḥ ayam asya apekṣā hetuḥ

original: yā gotrasthasya pudgalasya gotrasaṃpat sopadhiśeṣa [nirūpadhiśeṣa] nirvāṇādhigamāya pūrvaṅgamāya |
analyzed: yā gotra sthasya pudgalasya gotra saṃpad nirūpadhi śeṣa nirvāṇa adhigamāya pūrvaṅgamāya
ayam vyavadānasya ākṣepa hetuḥ
sat puruṣa saṃsevā saddharma śravaṇam yoni śomanaskāraḥ pūrva kṛtaḥ ca indriya paripākaḥ parigraha hetuḥ

original: tāni gotrasaṃgṛhītānyanāsravabodhipakṣyadharmabījāni teṣāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmabhinirvṛttihetuḥ te punaḥ svabījānnirvṛttā bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sopadhiśeṣa-nirupadhiśeṣa nirvāṇadhātvoḥ krameṇāvāhakahetuḥ |
analyzed: tāni gotra saṃgṛhītāni anāsrava bodhi pakṣya dharma bījāni teṣām bodhi pakṣyāṇām dharmāṇām abhinirvṛtti hetuḥ te punar sva bījāt nirvṛttāḥ bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ sa upadhi śeṣa nirupadhi śeṣa nirvāṇa dhātvoḥ krameṇa āvāhaka hetuḥ

original: tatra yacchrāvakagotraṃ śrāvakayānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate pratyekabuddhagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate mahāyānagotraṃ mahāyānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate ayaṃ vyavadānasya pratiniyamahetuḥ |
analyzed: tatra yat śrāvaka gotram śrāvaka yānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate pratyekabuddha gotram pratyekabuddha yānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate mahāyāna gotram mahāyānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate ayam vyavadānasya pratiniyama hetuḥ
yaḥ ca apekṣā hetuḥ vyavadāna pakṣyaḥ yaḥ ca yāvat pratiniyama hetuḥ ayam asya sahakāri hetuḥ iti ucyate
gotra asampanna tā buddhānām anutpādaḥ akṣaṇepapattiḥ asat puruṣa saṃsevā asat dharma śravaṇam a yoni śo manaskāraḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ virodha hetuḥ
asya eva virodha hetoḥ yat vaikalya virahita tvam ayam ucyate virodha hetuḥ

original: tatra yaḥ saṃkleśapakṣyo virodhahetuḥ sa vyavadānaheturdraṣṭavyaḥ |
analyzed: tatra yaḥ saṃkleśa pakṣyaḥ virodha hetuḥ sa vyavadāna hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
yaḥ vyavadāna pakṣyaḥ virodha hetuḥ sa saṃkleśa hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: evaṃ ebhirdaśabhirhetubhiḥ saṃkleśo daśabhireva vyavadānaṃ bhavatyatīte'pyadhvanyabhūdanāgate'pyadhvani bhaviṣyati saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā na ebhya uttari na ebhyo bhūyānanyo heturvidyate |
analyzed: evam ebhiḥ daśabhiḥ hetubhiḥ saṃkleśaḥ daśabhiḥ eva vyavadānam bhavati atīte ipi adhvani abhūt anāgate ipi adhvani bhaviṣyati saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā na ebhyaḥ uttari na ebhyaḥ bhūyān anyaḥ hetuḥ vidyate
tatra phalam katamat
samāsatas pañca phalāni
vipāka phalam nisyanda phalam visaṃyoga phalam puruṣakāra phalam adhipati phalam ca
akuśalānām dharmāṇām apāyeṣu vipākaḥ vipacyate
kuśala sa āsravāṇām sugatau
tad vipāka phalam

original: yatpunarakuśalābhyāsādakuśalārāmatā saṃtiṣṭhate akuśalabahulatā kuśalābhyāsātkuśalārāmatā kuśalabahulatā pūrvakarmasādṛśyena vā paścātphalānuvartanatā tanniṣyandaphalam |
analyzed: yat punar akuśala abhyāsāt akuśala ārāma tā saṃtiṣṭhate akuśala bahula tā kuśala abhyāsāt kuśala ārāma tā kuśala bahula tā pūrva karma sādṛśyena vā paścāt phala anuvartana tā tat nisyanda phalam
ārya aṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya kleśa nirodhaḥ visaṃyoga phalam

original: yaḥ punalaukikena mārgeṇa kleśanirodhaḥ sa nātyantamanuvartate pṛthagjanānām |
analyzed: yaḥ punar laukikena mārgeṇa kleśa nirodhaḥ sa na atyantam anuvartate pṛthagjanānām
tasmāt tat na visaṃyoga phalam

original: yatpunarekatyadṛṣṭe dharme'nyatamānyatamena śilpakarmasthānasanniśritena puruṣakāreṇa yadi vā kṛṣyā yadi vā vaṇijyayā yadi vā rājapauruṣṭeṇa lipi-gaṇana-nyasana-saṃkhyā-mudrayā sasyādikaṃ lābhādikañca phalamabhinirvartayati idamucyate puruṣakāraphalam |
analyzed: yat punar ekatya dṛṣṭe dharme nyatama anyatamena śilpa karmasthāna sanniśritena puruṣakāreṇa yadi vā kṛṣyā yadi vā vaṇijyayā yadi vā rāja pauruṣṭeṇa lipi gaṇana nyasana saṃkhyā mudrayā sasya ādikam lābha ādikam ca phalam abhinirvartayati idam ucyate puruṣakāra phalam
cakṣu vijñānan cukṣuḥ indriyasya adhipati phalam
evam yāvat manaḥ vijñānam manā indriyasya
tathā prāṇaiḥ aviyogaḥ jīvita indriyasya
iti sarveṣām indriyasya

original: iti sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ dvāviṃśatīnāṃ svena svenādhipatyena yatphalaṃ nirvartate tadadhipatiphalaṃ veditavyam |
analyzed: iti sarveṣām indriyāṇām dvāviṃśatīnām svena svena ādhipatyena yat phalam nirvartate tat adhipati phalam veditavyam
tat ca ādhipatyam dvāviṃśatīnām indriyāṇām veditavyam
tat yathā vastu saṃgrahaṇyām

original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvo buddhavacanaṃ samyaghetuphalaparidīpanākāraṃ viditvā sthānāsthānajñānabalagotramāsevanānvayāt krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca |
analyzed: evam hi bodhisattvaḥ buddha vacanam samyak hetu phala paridīpana ākāram viditvā sthāna asthāna jñāna bala gotra māsevana anvayāt krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca
na ca akṛtam anya kṛtam vā kasyacid vipacyate

original: na ca svayaṃ kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kalpaśatairapi praṇāśo bhavati phaladānaṃ prati |
analyzed: na ca svayam kṛtānām karmaṇām kalpa śataiḥ api praṇāśaḥ bhavati phala dānam prati

original: evamakṛtānabhyāgamakṛtāvipraṇāśaṃ buddhavacanaṃ paridīpitaṃ bodhisattvo yathābhūtaṃ jñātvā karma-svakatā-jñānabalagotraṃ krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca |
analyzed: evam akṛta an abhyāgama kṛta a vipraṇāśam buddha vacanam paridīpitam bodhisattvaḥ yathābhūtam jñātvā karma svaka tā jñāna bala gotram krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca
tatra katham bodhisattvaḥ śrutam paryeṣate

original: iha bodhisattvastīvraṃ gauravamupasthāpya subhāṣite sulapite dharma paryeṣate |
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ tīvram gauravam upasthāpya su bhāṣite su lapite dharma paryeṣate
evaṃrūpaḥ ca asya samāsena subhāṣita gauravam pratyupasthitam bhavati

original: yadasau bodhisattva ekasubhāṣitaśravaṇahetorapi taptāṃ jvalitāmapyayomayīṃ bhūmiṃ pareṇa prāmodyenādareṇa praviśedyadyanyathā subhāṣitaśravaṇaṃ na labheta prāgeva prabhūtasya subhāṣitasyārthe |
analyzed: yat asau bodhisattvaḥ eka subhāṣita śravaṇa hetoḥ api taptām jvalitām api ayaḥ mayīm bhūmim pareṇa prāmodyena ādareṇa praviśet yadi anyathā subhāṣita śravaṇam na labheta prāk eva prabhūtasya subhāṣitasya arthe

original: yacca bodhisattvasya sve ātmabhāve samucchraye premagauravaṃ prāgevānyeṣu sarvakāyapariṣkāreṣu bhojanapānādiṣu |
analyzed: yat ca bodhisattvasya sve ātmabhāve samucchraye prema gauravam prāk eva anyeṣu sarva kāya pariṣkāreṣu bhojana pāna ādiṣu

original: yacca subhāṣitaśravaṇe pūrvakaṃ premagauravaṃ paścimaṃ premagauravamupanidhāya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopaiti sa tathā subhāṣite gauravajātaḥ subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvannakhinnaśca bhavattyatṛptaśca |
analyzed: yat ca subhāṣita śravaṇe pūrvakam prema gauravam paścimam prema gauravam upanidhāya śatatamīm api kalām na upaiti sahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upaniṣadam api na upaiti sa tathā subhāṣite gaurava jātaḥ subhāṣitam śṛṇvan akhinnaḥ ca bhavatti atṛptaḥ ca
śrāddhaḥ ca bhavati prasāda bahalaḥ ca ārdra santānaḥ ṛjuka dṛṣṭiḥ

original: saguṇa kāmatayā dharmakāmatayā dharmabhāṇakamupasaṃkrāmati nopārambhābhiprāyeṇa sagauravatayā na mānastambhena kiṃkuśalagaveṣaṇatayā na ātmodbhāvanārtham ātmānañca parāṃśca kuśalamūle saṃniyojayiṣyāmīti na lābhasatkārahetoḥ |
analyzed: saguṇa kāma tayā dharma kāma tayā dharma bhāṇakam upasaṃkrāmati na upārambha abhiprāyeṇa sa gaurava tayā na māna stambhena kiṃkuśala gaveṣaṇa tayā na ātma udbhāvanā artham ātmānam ca parān ca kuśala mūle saṃniyojayiṣyāmi iti na lābha satkāra hetoḥ
saḥ evam upasaṃkramaṇa saṃpannaḥ asaṃkliṣṭaḥ ca dharma śṛṇoti avikṣiptaḥ ca
katham asaṃkliṣṭaḥ śṛṇoti
stambha saṃkleśa vigataḥ vamanyanā saṃkleśa vigataḥ laya saṃkleśa vigataḥ ca
tatra ṣaḍbhiḥ ākāraiḥ stambha saṃkleśa vigataḥ bhavati

ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ākāraiḥ stambha saṃkleśa vigataḥ

original: dharme gauravamupasthāpya dharmabhāṇake pudgale gauravamupasthāpya dharmamaparibhavan dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalamaparibhavan ebhiścaturbhirākārairavamanyanāsaṃkleśavigataḥ śṛṇoti |

amadyapānām madya miśram madya saṃsṛṣṭam vā

original: na ca paraviheṭhanāya pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti |

original: kālena ca bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadāti nākālena |

kalpikam ātmanaḥ parasya ca na akalpikam

original: na ca vilambitaṃ tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti |
analyzed: na ca vilambitam tvaritam tvaritam dānam dadāti

original: sa cenme dvau yācanakāvāgacchetāṃ sukhitaścākṛpaṇo'varākaḥ sanāthaḥ sapratisaraṇaḥ duḥkhitaśca kṛpaṇo varākaḥ anāthaḥ apratisaraṇaḥ |

original: ānulomiko vibandhasthāyī visabhāgāśayaḥ avaṣṭambhajaḥ kṛtaprakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaśca ṣaṣṭha upāyaḥ |
analyzed: ānulomikaḥ vibandha sthāyī visa bhāga āśayaḥ avaṣṭambha jaḥ kṛta prakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaḥ ca ṣaṣṭhaḥ upāyaḥ

original: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva tāvad yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāmo bhavati teṣāṃ ślakṣṇairmadhuraiḥ kāyavāksamudācārairupapradānānuvṛttisamudācāraiścātmagataṃ teṣāṃ pratighātamapanayati |
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvam eva tāvat yeṣām sattvānām dharmam deśayitu kāmaḥ bhavati teṣām ślakṣṇaiḥ madhuraiḥ kāya vāc samudācāraiḥ upapradāna anuvṛtti samudācāraiḥ ca ātma gatam teṣām pratighātam apanayati
pratighātam apanīya prema gaurava janayati
prema gauravam janayitvā dharma īrthi tvam janayati
tatas eṣām paścāt dharmam deśayati

original: tañca punardharmaṃ yathārhaṃ supraveśaṃ gamakaṃ kālenānupūrvamaviparītamarthopasaṃhitañca deśayati |

original: sattvavinaye paramayā ca kartukāmatayā anukampācittena samanvāgato bhavati |

original: sa ṛddhyā cittādeśanayā yuktarūpayā dharmadeśanayā paraṃ vā'dhyeṣya vicitrairvā prabhūtaiśca nirmitaiḥ sattvānvinayati |
analyzed: saḥ ṛddhyā citta ādeśanayā yukta rūpayā dharma deśanayā param vā adhyeṣya vicitraiḥ vā prabhūtaiḥ ca nirmitaiḥ sattvān vinayati

original: saṃkṣiptānāñcārthopasaṃhitānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ pravistaraṇatayā ativistṛtānāṃ cābhisaṃkṣepaṇatayā tathā uddeśadānena anusmaraṇaparipṛcchādānena dhṛtānāñcodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ samyagarthavivaraṇatayā sarvālambanasamādhyavatāramukheṣucānulomikyā avavādānusāsanyā sattvānanugṛhṇāti sattvānāmarthamācarati |
analyzed: saṃkṣiptānām ca artha upasaṃhitānām śāstrāṇām pravistaraṇa tayā ati vistṛtānām ca abhisaṃkṣepaṇa tayā tathā uddeśa dānena anusmaraṇa paripṛcchā dānena dhṛtānām ca udgṛhītānām ca dharmāṇām samyak artha vivaraṇa tayā sarva ālambana samādhi avatāra mukheṣu ca ānulomikyā avavāda anusāsanyā sattvān anugṛhṇāti sattvānām artham ācarati

original: ye ca sattvā gambhīrāṇāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ sūtrāntānāmābhiprāyikaṃ tathāgatānāmarthamavijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti nirvastukatāmanutpannāniruddhatāmā kāśasamatāṃ māyāsvapnopamatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti teṣāṃ yathāvadarthamavijñāyotrastamānasāḥ tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratikṣipanti naite tathāgatabhāṣitā iti |
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ gambhīrāṇām tathāgata bhāṣitānām śūnyatā pratisaṃyuktānām sūtrāntānām ābhiprāyikam tathāgatānām artham a vijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāva tām dharmāṇām abhivadanti nirvastuka tām anutpanna aniruddha tām ā kāśa sama tām māyā svapna upama tām dharmāṇām abhivadanti teṣām yathāvat artham a vijñāya utrasta mānasāḥ tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvam pratikṣipanti na ete tathāgata bhāṣitāḥ iti

original: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ sa bodhisattvaḥ ānulomikenopāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ tathāgatābhiprāyikamarthaṃ yathāvadanulomayati |

evam ca punar anulomayati

original: yathā neme dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante api tvabhilāpātmakaḥ svabhāva eṣāṃ nāsti teneme niḥsvabhāvā ityucyante |

original: yadyapyetavabhilāpyavastu vidyate yadāśrityābhilāpāḥ pravartante tadapi yairabhilāpairyat svabhāvamabhilapyate tadapi na tatsvabhāva paramārthataḥ

original: tasmānnirvastukā ityucyante evañca sati te'bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvā dharmāṇāmādita eva sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante |
analyzed: tasmāt nirvastukāḥ iti ucyante evañca sati tebhilāpyāḥ svabhāvāḥ dharmāṇām āditas eva sarveṇa sarvam na saṃvidyante

original: te kimutpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmādanutpannā aniruddhā ityucyante |
analyzed: te kim utpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmāt anutpannāḥ aniruddhāḥ iti ucyante

original: tadyathā cākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpakarmāṇi copalabhyante |
analyzed: tat yathā ca ākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpa karmāṇi ca upalabhyante

original: sarveṣāñca teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ rūpakarmaṇāṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadāti |
analyzed: sarveṣām ca teṣām rūpāṇām rūpa karmaṇām ca avakāśam dadāti

original: yadā ca punastad rūpaṃ tāni ca rūpakarmāṇyapanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti |
analyzed: yadā ca punar tat rūpam tāni ca rūpa karmāṇi apanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpa abhāva mātra ātmakam eva pariśuddham ākāśam khyāti

original: evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante |
analyzed: evam tasmin ākāśa sthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividha abhilāpa kṛtāḥ saṃjñāḥ vikalpāḥ prapañca saṃjñā anugatāḥ rūpa karma sthānīyāḥ pravartante

original: sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti |
analyzed: sarveṣām ca teṣām abhilāpa kṛtānām saṃjñā vikalpānām prapañca saṃjñā anugatānām citra rūpa karma sthānīyānām tat nirabhilāpyam vastu ākāśa sthānīyam avakāśam dadāti

original: yadā ca punarbodhisattvairjñānenāryeṇa te'bhilāpasamutthitā mithyāsaṃjñāvikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ tenāryajñānena tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastu sarvābhilāpyasvabhāvābhāvamātramākāśopamaṃ pariśuddhaṃ khyāti |
analyzed: yadā ca punar bodhisattvaiḥ jñānena āryeṇa mithyā saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañca saṃjñā anugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvam apanītāḥ bhavanti tadā teṣām bodhisattvānām parama āryāṇām tena ārya jñānena tat nirabhilāpyam vastu sarva abhilāpya svabhāva abhāva mātram ākāśa upamam pariśuddham khyāti

original: na ca tasmāt paramanyaṃ svabhāvamasya mṛgayante |

original: tadyathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathāsti |

original: na ca punaḥ sarveṇaiva sarvaṃ nāsti tanmāyākṛtam |

original: te cānena nayapraveśena na santo nāsanta ityadvayā māyāvat |

tasmāt māyā upamāḥ iti ucyante

original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāddharmadhātorna kiñcidutkṣipati na ca kiñcit pratikṣipati nonī-karoti nādhikaṃ karoti na vināśayati |

ayam bodhisattvasya ānulomikaḥ upāyaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya vibandhasthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvo bhojanapānādi-daśa-kāyādipariṣkārārthikānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] vipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate

original: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyā vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvatsacecchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhojanapānādīn kāyapariṣkārānyāvadarthamanupradāsyāmi |

anyathā na dāsyāmi iti

original: tathā kṣetravastugṛhavastvāpaṇavastu-rājyavastu-deśavastu-dhanavastu-dhānyavastu arthikānāṃ tathā śilpakarmasthānavidyārthikānāṃ tathā tena saha sakhyārthikānāmāvāhavivāhārthikānāmābhakṣaṇasaṃbhakṣaṇārthikānāṃ kṛtyasahāyārthikānāñca sattvānāṃ kāryavipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate |
analyzed: tathā kṣetra vastu gṛha vastu āpaṇa vastu rājya vastu deśa vastu dhana vastu dhānya vastu arthikānām tathā śilpa karma sthāna vidyā arthikānām tathā tena saha sakhya arthikānām āvāha vivāha arthikānām ābhakṣaṇa saṃbhakṣaṇa arthikānām kṛtya sahāya arthikānām ca sattvānām kārya vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vistareṇa yāvatkṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat |

original: punarbodhisattvaḥ aparādhiṣu duṣiṣvapakāriṣu sattveṣu parairvadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanakutsanatarjanapravāsanāyopātteṣvādhamanabandhana-vikrayāya copātteṣu vipratibandhe nāvatiṣṭhate śaktaḥ pratibalaḥ |

original: sa cenmātṛjñāḥ [pitṛjñā] bhavatheti vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato'smādvyasanādvimocayiṣyāmīti |

punar bodhisattvaḥ rāja caura udaka agni manuṣya amanuṣya ājīvikā śloka ādi bhaya bhītānām sattvānām vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat vistareṇaivamahaṃ bhavato'smādbhayāt paritrāsyāmīti |

analyzed: sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evam aham bhavatām priya samāgamam apriya vinābhāvam ca upasaṃhariṣyāmi iti
punar bodhisattvaḥ ābādhikānām sattvānām vyādhitānām vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato'smādvyādhiduḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti |
analyzed: sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evam aham bhavataḥ usmāt vyādhi duḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmi iti

original: te ca sattvāḥ evaṃ vibandhāvasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghuladhveva tasmin kuśalasamādāne pāpaprahāṇe ca yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā bhavanti |

original: ye punaḥ sattvā evaṃ vibandhasthāyino bodhisattvasya yathāparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na laghu-laghveva yathākāmaṃ pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvo yathā parikīrtitairvastubhirarthikānāṃ tāni vastūni nānuprayacchati hitakāmatayā |
analyzed: ye punar sattvāḥ evam vibandha sthāyinaḥ bodhisattvasya yathā parikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na laghu laghu eva yathākāmam pratipadyante teṣām bodhisattvaḥ yathā parikīrtitaiḥ vastubhiḥ arthikānām tāni vastūni na anuprayacchati hita kāma tayā

original: vyasanasthān bhītānpriyāpriyasaṃyogavisaṃyogakāmān vyādhiduḥkhena ārtān sattvān kañcitkālamadhyupekṣate hitakāmatayā |
analyzed: vyasana sthān bhītān priya apriya saṃyoga visaṃyoga kāmān vyādhi duḥkhena ārtān sattvān kañcid kālam adhyupekṣate hita kāma tayā
na ca upekṣaṇa āśayaḥ bhavati na a paritrāṇa āśayaḥ

original: te ca sattvā evaṃ niṣṭhurakarmaṇā pratipadyamānasya bodhisattvasya na tvāśayataḥ apareṇa samayena yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti pāpaprahāṇāya kuśalasamādānāya ca |

original: tānapi bodhisattvastasminneva kuśala-[mūle] samādāpayati yaduta mātṛjñatāyāṃ vistareṇa yāvacchīlasamādānānuvartanāyām |

na ca āśayataḥ kupitaḥ bhavati
kṛtyeṣu vaimukhyam upadarśayati hita kāma tayā
na ca āśayataḥ vimukhaḥ bhavati
tad eka tvam api asya anartham laukikam upasaṃharati hita kāma tayā
na ca āśayataḥ anartha kāmaḥ bhavati

original: visabhāgo'sya bodhisattvasya teṣu [sattveṣu] tasyāśceṣṭāyāḥ sa āśayo bhavati |

original: tena ca tānsattvāṃstasmin pāpaprahāṇe kuśalasamādāne ca sanniyojayati |

original: iha bodhisattvaḥ svāmibhūto vā rājabhūto vā ādhipatyaprāptaḥ svaṃ vā parijanaṃ sva vā vijitamevaṃ samyak samanuśāsti |
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ svāmi bhūtaḥ vā rāja bhūtaḥ vā ādhipatya prāptaḥ svam vā parijanam vā vijitam evam samyak samanuśāsti

original: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati |
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarva saṃskārāṇām abhilāpya svabhāvam nitya kālam eva na asti iti upalabhya anityataḥ sarva saṃskārān paśyati

original: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati |
analyzed: punar avijñātasya bhūtataḥ tasya eva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ a parijñāna hetukam udaya vyayam nirabhilāpya svabhāvān sarva saṃskārān anityataḥ samanupaśyati
sā utītān saṃskārān utpanna niruddhān samanupaśyati
teṣām na eva hetum upalabhate na api svabhāvam

original: tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati |
analyzed: tasmāt teṣām na eva hetutaḥ na eva svabhāvataḥ vidyamāna tām samanupaśyati
pratyutpanna a niruddhān samanupaśyati
teṣām hetum na upalabhate datta phala tvāt
svabhāvam punar upalabhate a niruddha tvāt

original: tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ |
analyzed: tasmāt teṣām svabhāvataḥ vidyamāna tām samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ
anāgatān saṃskārān anutpanna aniruddhān paśyati
teṣām hetum upalabhate a datta phala tvāt
no tu svabhāvam anutpanna tvāt

original: tasmātteṣāṃ bodhisattvo hetuto vidyamānatāṃ paśyati no tu svabhāvataḥ |
analyzed: tasmāt teṣām bodhisattvaḥ hetutaḥ vidyamāna tām paśyati no tu svabhāvataḥ

original: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati
analyzed: saḥ eva triṣu adhvasu avyavacchinnām saṃskāra santatim pravartamānām dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskāra kṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛta lakṣaṇāni paśyati
kṣaṇādurkṣvam caturtham saṃskṛta lakṣaṇam samanupaśyati

original: tatra pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇe svabhāvavināśānantara yo'pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇasvabhāvaprādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiriti paśyati |
analyzed: tatra pūrva saṃskāra kṣaṇe svabhāva vināśa anantara yopūrva saṃskāra kṣaṇa svabhāva prādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiḥ iti paśyati
utpannasya yaḥ tad kāla a vipraṇāśaḥ sā sthitiḥ iti paśyati

original: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati |
analyzed: tam pūrva niruddham saṃskāra jñaṇa svabhāvam apekṣya tasya utpannasya yat anya tvam anyathātvam vā sā jarā iti paśyati

original: tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati |
analyzed: tasmāt jāti kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam tasya eva utpannasya saṃskāra kṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāva vināśaḥ sa vyayaḥ iti paśyati
sa yad svabhāvam eva tam utpannam saṃskāra kṣaṇam samanupaśyati

original: tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca |
analyzed: tad svabhāvān eva tasya jātim sthitim jarām ca
na paśyati tad anya svabhāvān

original: tasmācca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca eva tasya saṃskārakṣaṇa [svabhāva] syāpagamaḥ sa eva teṣāṃ jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya saṃskārāṇāṃ samāsato dvayāvasthā-prabhāvitāni |
analyzed: tasmāt ca kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam ca eva tasya saṃskāra kṣaṇa svabhāva sya apagamaḥ saḥ eva teṣām jāti ādīnām iti yathābhūtam paśyati tāni etāni saṃskṛta lakṣaṇāni abhisamasya saṃskārāṇām samāsatas dvaya avasthā prabhāvitāni
bhāva prabhāvitāni abhāva prabhāvitāni ca

original: tatra bhagavatā yo bhāvastadekaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam |
analyzed: tatra bhagavatā yaḥ bhāvaḥ tat ekam saṃskṛta lakṣaṇam vyavasthāpitam
yaḥ tu abhāvaḥ tat dvitīyam saṃskṛta lakṣaṇam vyavasthāpitam

original: sa ca bhāvasteṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthityanyathātvaprabhāvita iti kṛtvā tṛtīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam |
analyzed: sa ca bhāvaḥ teṣām saṃskārāṇām sthiti anyathātva prabhāvitaḥ iti kṛtvā tṛtīyam saṃskṛta lakṣaṇam vyavasthāpitam

original: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati
analyzed: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāra mātram sthāpayitvā na tasya jātim na sthitim na jarām na anitya tām sarvakālam dravya svabhāva pariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati
tat kasya hetoḥ
saṃskāra mātram saḥ utpadyamānam upalabhate

original: nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām |
analyzed: na asya anyām jātim na sthitim na jarām na anitya tām

original: saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate |
analyzed: saṃskāra mātram eva ca jāyamānam tiṣṭhantam jīryamāṇam vinaśyamānam upalabhate
na tasya anyām jātim sthitim jarām anitya tām ca

original: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate |
analyzed: yuktyā api bodhisattvaḥ vimṛśan etān jāti ādīn dravyataḥ nā upalabhate
evam ca punar vimṛśan na upalabhate

original: sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate |
analyzed: sa ced rūpa ādi saṃskāra vinirmuktaḥ anyaḥ jāti dharmaḥ syāt sa yathā eva rūpa ādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ sva ātmanā utpadyate
tathā eva saḥ upi utpadyeta

original: evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt |
analyzed: evam sati dve janmanī syātām yat ca saṃskāra janma yat ca jāti janma tatra tat saṃskāra janma tasmāt jāti janmanaḥ ananyat eva vā syāt
anyat eva vā
yadi tāvat ananya evam satī a pārthikā jāti dravya kalpanā
anyā jātiḥ dravyatoḥ tītim na yujyate

original: atha ca punaranyadevaṃ sati saṃskāra-janma jātirna bhavati |
analyzed: atha ca punar anyat evam sati saṃskāra janma jātiḥ na bhavati
saṃskāra janma jātiḥ iti na yujyate

original: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ |
analyzed: yathā jātiḥ evam sthitiḥ jarā vināśaḥ ca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ

original: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā |
analyzed: sa ced vināśaḥ nāma svabhāvataḥ dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt saḥ upi utpadyeta nirudhyeta vā

original: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt |
analyzed: yadā ca vināśaḥ utpannaḥ syāt tadā sarva saṃskāraiḥ niruddhaiḥ bhavitavyam syāt

original: evaṃ satyalpakṛcchreṇa nirodhasamāpannasyeva cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmapravṛttiḥ syāt |
analyzed: evam sati alpa kṛcchreṇa nirodha samāpannasya iva citta caitasikānām dharmāṇām apravṛttiḥ syāt

original: tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā |
analyzed: tasya ca punar vināśasya nirodhāt niruddhaiḥ api taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punar eva bhavitavyam syāt vināśaḥ eṣām na asti iti kṛtvā

original: ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate |
analyzed: atas vināśaḥ utpadyate nirudhyate ca iti na yujyate

original: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate |
analyzed: na ca punar kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā sarva kāla astitām ca dravya satām svabhāva pariniṣpatim ca prajñapti satām paśyataḥ nirvid virāgaḥ vimuktiḥ ca yujyate
atas viparyayeṇa tu yujyate

original: ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
analyzed: iti ebhiḥ ākāraiḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva saṃskārāḥ anityāḥ iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: tān punareva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānādbodhisattvaḥ triḥprakārāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ sanniśrayabhāvena paśyati saṃskāraduḥkhatāyāḥ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatāyāśca |
analyzed: tān punar eva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānāt bodhisattvaḥ tris prakārāyāḥ duḥkha tāyāḥ sanniśraya bhāvena paśyati saṃskāra duḥkha tāyāḥ vipariṇāma duḥkha tāyāḥ duḥkha duḥkha tāyāḥ ca

original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
analyzed: evam hi bodhisattvaḥ sarva saṃskārāḥ duḥkhāḥ iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
analyzed: punar sarva dharmāṇām bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtānām dvividham nairātmyam yathābhūtam prajānāti
pudgala nairātmyam dharma nairātmyam ca
tatra idam pudgala nairātmyam
yat naivate vidyamānāḥ dharmāḥ pudgalāḥ
na api vidyamāna dharma vinirmuktaḥ nyaḥ pudgalaḥ vidyate
tatra idam dharma nairātmyam

original: yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate |
analyzed: yat sarveṣu abhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarva abhilāpa svabhāvaḥ dharmaḥ na saṃvidyate

original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
analyzed: evam hi bodhisattvaḥ sarva dharmāḥ anātmānaḥ iti yathābhūtam prajānāti
yaḥ punar eṣām eva saṃskārāṇām pūrvam hetu samucchinnānām paścāt aśeṣa uparamaḥ tad anyeṣām ca atyantam anabhinirvṛttiḥ aprādurbhāvaḥ
idam ucyate nirvāṇam
tat ca śāntam kleśa upaśamāt duḥkha upaśamāt ca veditavyam

original: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati |
analyzed: evam ca tāvat anadhyāśaya śuddhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭa satyaḥ vā śrāvaka āyānīyaḥ nirvāṇam adhimuktaḥ bhavati
evam ca abhivadati śāntam nirvāṇam iti

original: na cāsya tasminnirvāṇe yathābhūtāvagamo yathāvajjñānadarśanaṃ pravartate |
analyzed: na ca asya tasmin nirvāṇe yathā bhūta avagamaḥ yathāvat jñāna darśanam pravartate

original: tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā vā go-aśvarathakā vā hastirathakā vā upasaṃhṛtā bhaveyuḥ |
analyzed: tat yathā rāja putraḥ vā gṛhapati putraḥ vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā antargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ syāt tasya ca daharasya eva kumāra bhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakāḥ mṛga rathakāḥ vā go aśva rathakāḥ vā hasti rathakāḥ vā upasaṃhṛtāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt |
analyzed: sa ca rāja putraḥ vā gṛhapati putraḥ vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayan teṣu eva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛga saṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go śveṣu hastiṣu hasti saṃjñī syāt

original: athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta |
analyzed: atha ekadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatiḥ vā svasya putrasya vṛddheḥ anvayāt indriyāṇām paripākāt bhūtānām mṛgāṇām varṇam bhāṣeta
bhūtānām yāvat hastinām varṇam bhāṣeta

original: tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt |
analyzed: tasya punar rāja putrasya vā gṛhapati putrasya vā varṇa vādam śrutvā evam syāt

original: eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti |
analyzed: eṣām ayam rājā gṛhapatiḥ vā asmākam mṛga rathakānām yāvat hasti rathakānām vā varṇam bhāṣate iti

original: athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet
analyzed: atha apareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatiḥ vā svam putram bahis āgārāt nivīṣya bhūtān eva mṛgān tasmai upadarśayet bhūtān eva yāvat hastinaḥ upadarśayet

original: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta |
analyzed: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasmin samaye pratyātmam pratyavagamaḥ yathā bhūtaḥ utpadyeta

original: ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake adhimokṣaḥ pravṛtta iti |
analyzed: ime te bhūta arthikāḥ mṛga rathakāḥ vistareṇa yāvat hasti rathakāḥ yeṣām asmākam pitā dīrgharātram varṇam bhāṣitavān asmākam eva tu ayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpa mātrake tat pratibimba pratibhāsa mātrake adhimokṣaḥ pravṛttaḥ iti
tena pūrvakeṇa adhimokṣeṇa aritīyeran

original: evameva saṃsārāntargṛhasaṃvṛddhānāmaśuddhāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāmadṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ putrasthānīyānāṃ pitṛkalpairbuddhairbodhisattvaiśca mahābhūmipraviṣṭairnirvāṇapratyakṣadarśibhisteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ |
analyzed: evam eva saṃsāra antargṛha saṃvṛddhānām aśuddha āśayānām bodhisattvānām adṛṣṭa satyānām ca śrāvakāṇām putra sthānīyānām pitṛ kalpaiḥ buddhaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ ca mahā bhūmi praviṣṭaiḥ nirvāṇa pratyakṣa darśibhiḥ teṣām bodhisattvānām śrāvakāṇām ca purastāt nirvāṇasya yathā dṛṣṭasya varṇaḥ bhāṣitaḥ

original: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam |
analyzed: taiḥ ca tat nirvāṇam guṇataḥ ghoṣa mātra anusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātram adhimuktam

original: yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate
analyzed: yadā punar teṣām saṃbhāra paripāka vṛddheḥ anvayāt śraddhā āśayānām ca bodhisattvānām dṛṣṭa satyānām ca śrāvakāṇām nirvāṇe pratyakṣam jñāna darśanam utpadyate
tadā teṣām api yathābhūtaḥ pratyavagamaḥ utpadyate

original: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ |
analyzed: idam tat nirvāṇam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām yasya buddha bodhisattvaiḥ varṇāḥ bhāṣitaḥ
asmābhiḥ tu pūrva bāla prajña tayā na yathābhūtam adhimuktam
asti tu tat asya pratirūpakam
asti pratibhāsa mātrakam

original: te tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇa ritīyante paścimakaṃ yathābhūtādhimokṣaṃ niśritya |
analyzed: te tena pūrvakeṇa adhimokṣeṇa ritīyante paścimakam yathābhūta adhimokṣam niśritya

original: tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet |
analyzed: tat yathā kiñcid vyādhitam puruṣam kaścid mahā vaidyaḥ tasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāya ānulomikaiḥ bhaiṣajyaiḥ ūpatiṣṭhet

original: sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ |
analyzed: sa ca vyādhita puruṣaḥ dīrgha kāla pratiniṣevaṇāt teṣām bhaiṣajyānām tad adhimuktaḥ eva bhavet tad ārāmaḥ
teṣu eva sāra darśī bhavet

abhavyaḥ ca aham asmāt pratipakṣāt punar parihāṇāya iti manasikāreṇa
abhavyaḥ ca aham evam dṛḍha pratipakṣaḥ taiḥ sarva āsrava sa āsravaiḥ dharmaiḥ sarva māraiḥ ca abhibhavitum iti manasikāreṇa

original: asaṃlīnaṃ ca me mānasaṃ pravartate sarvabuddhadharmeṣviti manasikāreṇa |
analyzed: asaṃlīnam ca me mānasam pravartate sarva buddha dharmeṣu iti manasikāreṇa

original: sarvaduṣkaracaryāsu ca me nāsti vyatheti manasikāreṇa |
analyzed: sarva duṣkara caryāsu ca me nā asti vyathā iti manasikāreṇa

original: adhimuktaṃ ca me mahāyāne cittamekāntena na tadanyahīnayāneṣviti manasikāreṇa |
analyzed: adhimuktam ca me mahāyāne cittam ekāntena na tad anya hīna yāneṣu iti manasikāreṇa
sarva sattva artha kriyā abhiratam ca me cittam iti manasikāreṇa
ebhiḥ daśabhiḥ citta āśaya manasikāraiḥ praviśati
adhicittavihāra sthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva saṃskārān ādīnava ākāraiḥ vicitraiḥ vidūṣayati
tebhyaḥ ca mānasam udvejayati
buddha jñāne ca anuśaṃsa darśī bhavati vicitraiḥ anuśaṃsa ākāraiḥ

original: tatra ca spṛhājāto bhavati ghanarasena cchandena |
analyzed: tatra ca spṛhā jātaḥ bhavati ghana rasena chandena
sattvadhātum duḥkhitam vyavalokayati vicitraiḥ duḥkha ākāraiḥ
teṣu ca sattveṣu upekṣā cittaḥ bhavati artha pratiśaraṇa cittaḥ
sarva saṃskāreṣu apramattaḥ
bodhāya uttapta vīryaḥ
sattveṣu vipula karuṇā āśayaḥ
teṣām sattvānām atyanta duḥkha vimokṣa upāyam sarva kleśa anāvaraṇa jñānam eva paśyati

original: tasya ca vimokṣasya samudāgamāya dharmadhātau sarvavikalpapracāra-saṃlkeśotpattipratipakṣaṃ prajñāṃ paśyati |
analyzed: tasya ca vimokṣasya samudāgamāya dharmadhātau sarva vikalpa pracāra saṃl keśa utpatti pratipakṣam prajñām paśyati

original: tasya ca jñānālokasya niṣpattaye samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paśyati |
analyzed: tasya ca jñāna ālokasya niṣpattaye samyaksaṃbodhim paśyati
tat ca dhyāna samādhi samāpatti nirhāram bodhisattva piṭaka śravaṇa pūrvakam śravaṇa nidānam paśyati
dṛṣṭvā ca mahatā vīrya ārambheṇa śruta paryeṣṭim āpadyate

original: saddharmaśravaṇahetornāsti taddraviṇaṃ pariṣkāramādhyātmika-vāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajati |
analyzed: saddharma śravaṇa hetoḥ na asti tat draviṇam pariṣkāram ādhyātmika vāhyam vastu yat na parityajati
na asti sā guru paricaryā yān na abhyupagacchati
na asti sā santatiḥ yān na abhyupagacchati
na asti sā kāya utpīḍā yān na abhyupagacchati

original: sa prītataro bhavatyeka catuṣpadagāthāśravaṇena na tvevaṃ trisāhasrapūrṇapratimena mahāratnarāśinā |
analyzed: sa prītataraḥ bhavati eka catuṣpada gāthā śravaṇena na tu evam tri sāhasra pūrṇa pratimena mahā ratna rāśinā

original: prītataro bhavatyekadharmapadaśravaṇena samyaksaṃbuddhopanītena bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakena na sarvaśakratva [-māratva-] brahmatva-lokapālatva-cakravartitva-samucchrayapratilambhaiḥ
analyzed: prītataraḥ bhavati eka dharma pada śravaṇena samyaksaṃbuddha upanītena bodhisattva caryā pariśodhakena na sarva śakratva māra tva brahmatva lokapāla tva cakravarti tva samucchraya pratilambhaiḥ
sa ced enam kaścid evam vadet

original: evamahamidaṃ [dharmapadaṃ] samyaksaṃbuddhopanītaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakaṃ te'nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa cenmahatyāmagnikhadāyāmātmānaṃ prakṣipasi mahāntañca duḥkhopakramaṃ saṃpratīcchasīti |
analyzed: evam aham idam dharma padam samyaksaṃbuddha upanītam sarva bodhisattva caryā pariśodhakam tena nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa ced mahatyām agni khadāyām ātmānam prakṣipasi mahāntam ca duḥkha upakramam saṃpratīcchasi iti
śrutvā asya evam bhavet

original: utsahāmyahamasya dharmapadasyārthe pūrvavat trisāhasramahāsāhasrapratimāyāmāpyagnikhadāyāṃ brahmalokādātmānamutsraṣṭuṃ prāgeva pratyavarāyām
analyzed: utsahāmi aham asya dharma padasya arthe pūrvavat tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra pratimāyām āpya agni khadāyām brahma lokāt ātmānam utsraṣṭum prāk eva pratyavarāyām
nāraka duḥkha saṃvāsaiḥ api asmābhiḥ buddha dharmāḥ paryeṣitavyāḥ prāk eva prākṛtaiḥ duḥkha upakramaiḥ iti

original: evaṃrūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa dharmān paryeṣyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti |
analyzed: evaṃrūpeṇa vīrya ārambheṇa dharmān paryeṣya evam yoniśas manasikaroti

original: yathā dharmānnudharmapratipattiṃ buddhadharmānugatāṃ na vyañjanasvaramātraviśaddhimiti viditvā tadeva śrutaṃ niśritya dharmanimittāni samyagālambanīkurvan viviktaṃ kāmairvistareṇa prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthañca dhyānaṃ laukikaṃ catasra ārūpyasamāpattīrlaukikīścatvāryapramāṇāni pañca cābhijñā upasaṃpadya viharati |
analyzed: yathā dharma annu dharma pratipattim buddha dharma anugatām na vyañjana svara mātra viśaddhim iti viditvā tat eva śrutam niśritya dharma nimittāni samyak ālambanīkurvan viviktam kāmaiḥ vistareṇa prathamam dvitīyam tṛtīyam caturtham ca dhyānam laukikam catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ laukikīḥ catvāri apramāṇāni pañca ca abhijñāḥ upasaṃpadya viharati

original: sa tairbahulaṃ vihṛtya tāni dhyānāni samādhīn samāpattīḥ vyāvartayitvā praṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātau yatra sattvārthaṃ bodhipakṣadharmaparipūriṃ ca paśyati tatropapadyate |
analyzed: sa taiḥ bahulam vihṛtya tāni dhyānāni samādhīn samāpattīḥ vyāvartayitvā praṇidhāna vaśena kāmadhātau yatra sattva artham bodhi pakṣa dharma paripūrim ca paśyati tatra upapadyate
na tu eva asya tad vaśena upapattiḥ bhavati

original: tasya kāmavītarāgatvātkāmabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti dhyānasamādhisamāpattivyāvartanatvād bhavabandhanāni |
analyzed: tasya kāma vīta rāga tvāt kāma bandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti dhyāna samādhi samāpatti vyāvartana tvāt bhava bandhanāni

original: adhimukticaryā-bhūmāvevāsya pūrvameva dharmatathatādhimokṣād dṛṣṭikṛtabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti |
analyzed: adhimukti caryā bhūmau eva asya pūrvam eva dharma tathatā adhimokṣāt dṛṣṭi kṛta bandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti
mithyā rāga dveṣa mohāḥ ca asya atyantam na pravartante
tasya buddha darśanam vistareṇa kuśala mūla viśuddhiḥ pūrvavat veditavyā
tatra ayam viśeṣaḥ

original: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalasya karmārasya hastagataṃ prakṣīṇamalakaṣāyamapi samadharaṇamavatiṣṭhate tulyamānam |
analyzed: tat yathā tat eva suvarṇa kuśalasya karmārasya hasta gatam prakṣīṇam ala kaṣāyam api sama dharaṇam avatiṣṭhate tulya mānam
evam asya sā kuśala mūla viśuddhiḥ veditavyā
upapattitaḥ ca śakraḥ bhavati deva indraḥ yat bhūyasā
kuśalaḥ sattvānām kāma rāga vinivartana tāyai

original: prabhāve'pi yatra pūrvake vihāre sahasramākhyātaṃ tatreha śatasahasraṃ veditavyam |
analyzed: prabhāve pi yatra pūrvake vihāre sahasram ākhyātam tatra iha śata sahasram veditavyam

original: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāmadhicittavihāraścittamanaskāra-pariniṣpa [tti-] praveśataśca saṃsārasattvadhātumahābodhisamyak-prativedha [ta] śca sattvaduḥkhavimokṣopāya-samyak-paryeṣaṇataśca mahāgauravadharmaparyeṣaṇataśca dharmānudharmapratipatti-laukikadhyānasamādhisamāpattyabhijñābhinirhāra-vihārataśca tadvyāvartanaṃ praṇidhāya yatra kāmopapattitaśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
analyzed: ayam bodhisattvānām adhi citta vihāraḥ citta manaskāra pariniṣpa tti praveśataḥ ca saṃsāra sattvadhātu mahā bodhi samyak prativedha taḥ ca sattva duḥkha vimokṣa upāya samyak paryeṣaṇataḥ ca mahā gaurava dharma paryeṣaṇataḥ ca dharma anudharma pratipatti laukika dhyāna samādhi samāpatti abhijñā abhinirhāra vihārataḥ ca tad vyāvartanam praṇidhāya yatra kāma upapattitaḥ ca kuśala mūla viśuddhitaḥ ca upapattitaḥ ca prabhāvataḥ ca samāsa nirdeśata

original: vistaranirdeśaḥ punaryathāsūtraṃ tadyathā daśabhūmike prabhākaryāṃ bhūmau |
analyzed: vistara nirdeśaḥ punar yathāsūtram tat yathā daśa bhūmike prabhākaryām bhūmau
śruta ākāra dharma āloka avabhāsa samādhi āloka avabhāsa prabhāvita tvāt asyāḥ bhūmeḥ prabhākarī iti ucyate

original: adhyātmaṃ cittaviśuddhimupādāya sā prabhā saṃbhavati tasmātsa vihāraḥ adhicitta ityucyate |
analyzed: adhyātmam citta viśuddhim upādāya sā prabhā saṃbhavati tasmāt sa vihāraḥ adhicittaḥ iti ucyate
yena arthena prabhākarī bhūmiḥ tena eva arthena adhicittavihāraḥ veditavyaḥ
tatra katamaḥ bodhisattvānām bodhi pakṣya pratisaṃyukta ūdhi prajña vihāraḥ

original: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhicittavihāre daśa dharmālokapraveśāḥ śrutaparyeṣṭimadhipattiṃ kṛtvā pratilabdhā bhavanti |
analyzed: iha bodhisattvena pūrvam eva adhicittavihāre daśa dharmāloka praveśāḥ śruta paryeṣṭim adhipattim kṛtvā pratilabdhāḥ bhavanti
yeṣām adhimātra tvāt paripūrṇa tvāt adhicittavihāram atikramya prathamam adhiprajñavihāram praviśati

original: [te] punardaśa dharmālokapraveśā granthato yathā sūtrameva veditavyaḥ |
analyzed: te punar daśa dharma āloka praveśāḥ granthataḥ yathā sūtram eva veditavyaḥ

original: ye ca prajñapyante yatra ca prajñapyante yena ca prajñapyante te ca yatsamāḥ paramārthaḥ yasya ca saṃkleśa-vyavadānaśca saṃkliśyante viśuddhante ca yatpratiyusaṃktena saṃkleśena saṃkliśyante yayā cānuttarayā viśuddhyā viśudhyante |
analyzed: ye ca prajñapyante yatra ca prajñapyante yena ca prajñapyante te ca yad samāḥ paramārthaḥ yasya ca saṃkleśa vyavadānaḥ ca saṃkliśyante ca saṃkliśyante ca saṃkleśena saṃkliśyante yayā ca anuttarayā viśuddhyā viśudhyante
iti ayam samāsa arthaḥ teṣām dharma āloka nirdeśānām veditavyaḥ
sa tasmin vihāre vyavasthitaḥ

original: abhedyāśayatā pūrvaṅgamairyathāsūtrameva daśākāreṇa jñānaparipākena [jñāna-] paripācakairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati tathāgatakule tadātmaka-dharmapratilambhāt |
analyzed: abhedya āśaya tā pūrvaṅgamaiḥ yathāsūtram eva daśa ākāreṇa jñāna paripākena jñāna paripācakaiḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃvṛttaḥ bhavati tathāgata kule tad ātmaka dharma pratilambhāt

original: sarvākārāṃ bodhisattvāpekṣāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā smṛtyupasthānapramukhān saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayanti yathāsūtrameva |
analyzed: sarvākārām bodhisattva apekṣām adhipatim kṛtvā smṛti upasthāna pramukhān saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyān dharmān bhāvayanti yathāsūtram eva

original: tasya tāndharmānupāyaparigraheṇa bhāvayataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ susūkṣmāpyasya skandhadhātvāyatanānyabhiniveśaḥ sarveñjitāni cātyantāsamudācārataḥ prahīyante |
analyzed: tasya tān dharmān upāya parigraheṇa bhāvayataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ su sūkṣmā api asya skandha dhātu āyatanāni abhiniveśaḥ sarva iñjitāni ca atyanta asamudācārataḥ prahīyante

original: teṣāṃ prahāṇād yāni tathāgata-vivarṇitāni karmāṇi tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhyācarati |
analyzed: teṣām prahāṇāt yāni tathāgata vivarṇitāni karmāṇi tāni sarveṇa sarvam na adhyācarati
yāni punar tathāgata varṇitāni tāni sarvā api anuvartante yathāvat

original: tathābhūtaśca bhūyasā mātrayā snigdhamṛdukarmaṇyacittaśca bhavati tathā citrākārasuviśuddhacittaśca |
analyzed: tathābhūtaḥ ca bhūyasā mātrayā snigdha mṛdu karmaṇi acittaḥ ca bhavati tathā citra ākāra su viśuddha cittaḥ ca
kṛtajña kṛta vedita ādibhiḥ tad āśaya anuguṇaiḥ vicitraiḥ śukla dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhavati

original: uttari ca bhūmipariśodhakāni karmāṇi samanveṣamāṇo mahāvīryārambhaprāpto bhavati |
analyzed: uttari ca bhūmi pariśodhakāni karmāṇi samanveṣamāṇaḥ mahā vīrya ārambha prāptaḥ bhavati
tasya tat nidānam āśaya adhyāśaya adhimukti dhātuḥ paripūryate
tad nidānam ca asaṃhāryaḥ bhavati avikampyaḥ sarva tīrthya māra śāsana pratyarthika bhūtaiḥ
pūrvavat ca buddha darśanam vistareṇa kuśala mūla viśuddhiḥ veditavyā
tatra ayam viśeṣaḥ
tat yathā tat eva suvarṇa kuśalena karmakāreṇa alaṃkāra vidhi kṛtam asaṃhāryam bhavati akṛta ābharaṇaiḥ jātarupaiḥ
evam asya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśala mūlāni asaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti tad anya bāla vihāra sthitaiḥ bodhisattva kuśala mūlaiḥ
tat yathā ca maṇi ratna muktā ālokam asaṃhāryam bhavati tad anyaiḥ maṇibhiḥ
sarva vāta udaka vṛṣṭibhiḥ ca an ācchedya prabham bhavati
evam ayam bodhisattvaḥ usaṃhāryaḥ bhavati sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ
an ācchedya prajñā ālokaḥ ca bhavati sarva māra pratyarthikaiḥ
upapattitaḥ ca suyāmaḥ bhavati deva rājaḥ
kuśalaḥ sattvānām satkāyadṛṣṭi vinivartana tāyai

original: prabhāve ca yatra pūrvavihāre śatasahasraguṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ tatrāsmin koṭisamākhyātaṃ veditavyam |
analyzed: prabhāve ca yatra pūrva vihāre śata sahasraguṇam samākhyātam tatra asmin koṭi samākhyātam veditavyam
ayam bodhisattvānām bodhi pakṣya ādhi prajña vihāraḥ

original: dharmālokapraveśaniṣpattiṃ pratilābhataśca jñānaparipācanataśca bodhipakṣyadharmaniṣevaṇataśca satkāyadṛṣṭyādi-sarvābhiniveśeñjitaprahāṇataśca pratiṣiddhānujñātakarmavivarjana-niṣevaṇataśca tannidānaṃ cittamārdavataśca tadanu-kūlaguṇasamṛddhitaśca bhūmipariśodhaka-karmaparyeṣṭimārabhya mahāvīryārambhataśca tannidānamāśayādhyāśayādhimuktiviśodhanataśca tannidānaṃ sarvaśāsanapratyarthikāsaṃhāryataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
analyzed: dharma āloka praveśa niṣpattim pratilābhataḥ ca jñāna paripācanataḥ ca bodhi pakṣya dharma niṣevaṇataḥ ca satkāya dṛṣṭi ādi sarva abhiniveśa iñjita prahāṇataḥ ca pratiṣiddha anujñāta karma vivarjana niṣevaṇataḥ ca tat nidānam citta mārdavataḥ ca tad anukūla guṇa samṛddhitaḥ ca bhūmi pariśodhaka karma paryeṣṭim ārabhya mahā vīrya ārambhataḥ ca tat nidānam āśaya adhyāśaya adhimukti viśodhanataḥ ca tat nidānam sarva śāsana pratyart

original: vistaranirdeśaḥ punastadyathādaśabhūmike'rciṣmatī bhūminirdeśe bodhipakṣyā dharmāstasyāṃ bhūmau jñānārcibhūtāḥ samyagdharmadeśanā prajñāvabhāsakarakālokānām
analyzed: vistara nirdeśaḥ punar tat yathā daśa bhūmikā irciṣmatī bhūmi nirdeśe bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ tasyām bhūmau jñāna arci bhūtāḥ samyak dharma deśanā prajñā avabhāsa karaka ālokānām
tasmāt sā bhūmiḥ arciṣmatī iti ucyate
sā eva ca iha bodhi pakṣya aprajñā avabhāsa karadhi prajñavihāraḥ iti ucyate
tatra katamaḥ bodhisattvānām satya pratisaṃyuktaḥ dvitīya ūdhi prajña vihāraḥ

original: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvake'dhiprajñavihāre [yā] daśa viśuddhāśayasamatāḥ pratilabdhāḥ tāsāmadhimātrātvāt paripūrṇatvāt dvitīyamadhiprajñavihāraṃ praviśati |
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvaka idhi prajña vihāre yāḥ daśa viśuddha āśaya samatāḥ pratilabdhāḥ tāsām adhimātrā tvāt paripūrṇa tvāt dvitīyam adhi prajña vihāram praviśati
daśa viśuddha āśaya samatāḥ yathāsūtram granthataḥ veditavyāḥ
asamaiḥ ca buddhaiḥ buddhāḥ samāḥ
tad anya sattvadhātu samatikrāntāḥ
yaiḥ ca dharmaiḥ yathā samāḥ
iti ayam samāsa arthaḥ viśuddha āśaya samatānām veditavyaḥ
saḥ usmin vihāre vyavasthitaḥ

original: bhūyo jñānavaiśeṣikatāṃ prārthayamānaḥ catvāryasatyāni daśabhirākārairyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
analyzed: bhūyas jñāna vaiśeṣika tām prārthayamānaḥ catvāri asatyāni daśabhiḥ ākāraiḥ yathābhūtam prajānāti
granthataḥ yathāsūtram eva sarvam veditavyam
para saṃjñāpana tām pratyātma jñāna tām tad ubhaya adhiṣṭhāna tām ca ārabhya yat ca deśyate
sūtra vinaya mātṛkām ārabhya yena ca deśyate

original: pratyupannaduḥkhātmakatāṃ hetu[ta-] ścānāgataduḥkhaprabhāvatāṃ hetukṣayāt [tat-] kṣayānutpāda [na] tāṃ tatprahāṇopāyaniṣevaṇatāṃ cārabhya yathā deśyate |
analyzed: pratyupanna duḥkha ātmaka tām hetutaḥ ca anāgata duḥkha prabhāva tām hetu kṣayāt tat kṣaya anutpāda na tām tad prahāṇa upāya niṣevaṇa tām ca ārabhya yathā deśyate
iti ayam samāsa arthaḥ tasya daśa ākārasya catur ārya satya jñānasya veditavyaḥ

original: sa evaṃ satyakuśalaḥ sarvañca saṃskāragataṃ prajñayā samyag vidūṣayati |
analyzed: saḥ evam satya kuśalaḥ sarvañca saṃskāra gatam prajñayā samyak vidūṣayati
sattvadhātau ca karūṇa āśayam vivardhayati

asaṅga jñāna abhimukhasya prajñāpāramitā vihārasya ābhimukhyāt abhimukhī iti ucyate

original: tatsamutathā nāya cānābhoganirnimittākalpāvikalpanatayā'pramāṇabuddhiviṣaya-samutthānaṃ paśyan nirantaraṃ niścchidraṃ prayujyate sarveryāpatha-cāravihāramanasikāreṣu

original: apyeva te tasya pāpakasya karmaṇo vipakṣabhūtasya vicitrasya yatprātipakṣikaṃ vicitraṃ kuśalaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakaṃ karma tasyedaṃ vicitraphalānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā tasya mahataḥ phalānuśaṃsasya spṛhyamānarūpāratasmācca pāpādvirameyuḥ |

original: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate

original: prāmodyaprītiprabhāsvareṇa cittena kuśalasamācārād vyāma-prabhatā ca kāñcanasannibhatvacatā śukladantatā ūrṇā ca śvetā nirvartate |

original: evamanayā caturākārayā sukṛtakarmāntatayā bodhisattvānāmeṣāṃ dvātriṃśatāṃ-mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānāṃ pratilambho viśuddhiśca bhavati |
analyzed: evam anayā catur ākārayā su kṛta karmānta tayā bodhisattvānām eṣām dvātriṃśatām mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānām pratilambhaḥ viśuddhiḥ ca bhavati
tatra gotra bhūmau bodhisattvānām etat lakṣaṇa bīja mātra ivasthānam veditavyam
adhimukti caryā bhūmau prāpti upāye vṛttiḥ eṣām veditavyā
adhyāśaya śuddhi bhūmau prāptiḥ eṣām veditavyā

original: tadanyāsu taduttarottarāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu viśuddhireṣāṃ veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā

original: tatra rūpitvādeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ hīnamadhyottamaiśca sattvaiḥ sūpalakṣyatvāt satsu sarveṣveva buddhadharmeṣu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvetānyeva mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpitāni |

original: tatra samāsataḥ sarvasattveṣu puṇyasadṛśena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaiko romakūpo nirvartate |

yāvat sarva romakūpa praviṣṭaḥ puṇya skandhaḥ
iyatā puṇya skandhena ekaikam anuvyañjana gati nirvartate

original: tataḥ śataguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nirvartate |

analyzed: yāvān ūrṇā praviṣṭaḥ puṇya skandhaḥ tatas śata sahasraguṇena puṇya skandhena uṣṇīṣa śiraska tā anavalokita mūrdha tā ca nirvartate

original: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāsaṃgṛhīto'nyo dharmaśaṃkhyo nāma nirvartate |

original: yaḥ kaścit sadevamānuṣā [surā] llokāddevabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāsyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau dṛḍhāmadhimuktimutpādyemāṃ śroṣyatyudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati bhāvanākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣāṃ vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyatyantato lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyati pūjāsatkārañca prayokṣyate |
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid sa deva mānuṣā surāḥ lokāt deva bhūtaḥ vā manuṣya bhūtaḥ vā śramaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā asyām bodhisattva bhūmau dṛḍhām adhimuktim utpādya imām śroṣyati udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati bhāvanā ākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣām vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyati antatas lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyati pūjā satkāram ca prayokṣyate

original: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ |
analyzed: tasya samāsatas yāvān puṇya skandhaḥ bhagavatā sarva bodhisattva piṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya śravaṇa ādi karmaṇaḥ ākhyātaḥ uttānaḥ vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvān asya puṇya skandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni |
analyzed: tathā hi asyām bodhisattva bhūmau sarvasya bodhisattva piṭakasya uddeśa nirdeśa mukhāni saṃgṛhītāni ākhyātāni

original: yāvaccāsyāṃ [bodhisattva] bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya-dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ sthāsyati pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti saddharmāntarddhānāya |
analyzed: yāvat ca asyām bodhisattva bhūmau yaḥ dharma vinayaḥ vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulam uddeśa svādhyāya dharma anudharma pratipattitaḥ sthāsyati pṛthu vṛddhi vaipulya tām ca gamiṣyati na tāvat saddharma pratirūpakāḥ pracurāḥ bhaviṣyanti saddharma antarddhānāya

original: yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati |
analyzed: yatas ca punar saddharma pratirūpakāḥ pracurāḥ bhaviṣyanti tatas ca ayam saddharmaḥ tasya tat antardhānam bhaviṣyati

original: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam
analyzed: iti bodhisattva bhūmau ādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭham pratiṣṭhā paṭalam
samāptā ca bodhisattva bhūmiḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam ācārya ārya āsaṅga pādānām

original: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat |
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ hetu prabhavāḥ hetum teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evam vādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
